summary: I made a video a while ago on how to export NPC FaceGen Data properly in order to prevent the 'Grey Face Bug' and decided to upload it here as a resource/tutorial. :)
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][center][font=Tahoma][color=#00ffff]Exporting FaceGen Data in the Creation Kit[/color][/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]by Zylice[/font][/center][/size][/b]



[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]I made a video a while ago on how to export NPC FaceGen Data properly in order to prevent the 'Grey Face Bug' and decided to upload it here as a resource/tutorial. :)
